name: Kimberly
description: Am Kimberly, I am a very decent woman and I do have regards and utmost respect for men. My friends say I am caring, loving, honest, understanding, sincere, energetic, kindhearted, trustworthy, family oriented, romantic, faithful and God fearing. I love kids a lot and really love playing with kids and being around them makes me happy. I will treat any child like my real child…
